uvi.product_version: versions from v2.6.18 to before v5.14.10
uvi.description:
RDMA/cma: Ensure rdma_addr_cancel() happens before issuing more requests

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.14.10 by commit 03d884671572af8bcfbc9e63944c1021efce7589, it was introduced in version v2.6.18 by commit e51060f08a61965c4dd91516d82fe90617152590. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: RDMA/cma: Ensure rdma_addr_cancel() happens before issuing more requests
